document.title: The Power of Kawaii: Viewing Cute Images Promotes a Careful Behavior and Narrows Attentional Focus (Extract)
document.citation: Nittono H, Fukushima M, Yano A, Moriya H (2012) The Power of Kawaii: Viewing Cute Images Promotes a Careful Behavior and Narrows Attentional Focus. PLoS ONE 7(9): e46362. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0046362
document.body: The participants were asked to perform a task requiring a high level of concentration twice, with a break of a few minutes between the tasks for mental recovery.
